ex & iecex

Exd & Exia Range available

As well as our standard range of load cells, we have our  hazardous area rated (EXd & Exia) range for hazardous area applications for zones 1 & 2.

Learn more 

wireless/wired

Telemetry | Digital/Analogue

Telemetry 2.4GHz wireless load cell option or wired option with various signal outputs including 4-20mA, RS485 and standard milli-volts. 

Learn more 

subsea 

Subtitle

Subsea range of load cells with depth ratings up to and including 5000 meters. High integrity and lifespan with applications currently spanning  25 years.
